definition: (phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: L-ascorbic acid, trehalose, and glutin can significantly increase the Tg of wheat dough.
sentences.chinese: 食品添加剂对面团的玻璃化转变温度有显著影响。

sentences.english: The vitrified soil, as hard as granite, can be used for landfill.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃化的土壤类似坚硬的花岗岩，可以用于填埋。

sentences.english: Objective To study the cryopreservation technique of Dioscorea opposita germplasm resources by vitrification.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究怀山药种质资源的玻璃化超低温保存技术。

sentences.english: Increasing the warming rate can decrease the devitrification time effectively.
sentences.chinese: 提高复温速率能够有效地缩短反玻璃化时间。

sentences.english: Several food additives, e. g. , L-ascorbic acid, trehalose, and glutin can significantly increase the Tg of wheat dough.
sentences.chinese: 食品添加剂对面团的玻璃化转变温度有显著影响。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the clinical value of vitrification of human early embryos in straws.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨麦管玻璃化法冷冻技术的临床应用效果。

sentences.english: There is no logical explanation for the vitrification of stone forts and cities, except from an atomic blast.
sentences.chinese: 除了核爆炸外，石城堡和都市玻璃化没有合理的解释。

sentences.english: The inverse cascade motion model of glass transition has been suggested.
sentences.chinese: 提出了玻璃化转变的反串级涡旋运动模式。

sentences.english: In this paper, the culture system and vitrification of carnation in vitro were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了香石竹组织培养系统和玻璃化问题。

sentences.english: Shoot tips of Papaya were successfully cryopreserved using the vitrification method for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次采用玻璃化法成功保存了番木瓜茎尖。

sentences.english: A partially vitrified brick or a mass of bricks fused together.
sentences.chinese: 炼砖部分玻璃化的砖或熔凝在一起的一堆砖。

sentences.english: Homogeneous bridging groups always raise the glass temperature.
sentences.chinese: 同类桥联基因总是提高玻璃化温度。

sentences.english: The dynamics of the segments between the crosslinks can be also associated with the glass transition.
sentences.chinese: 交联间链段的重定向运动也反映了玻璃化转变的特征。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
liquid water (as opposed to steam or ice)
